summary: A re-texture of the ebony blades.
descriptionHtml:
I really like the shape of the ebony sword (one-handed) in vanilla, but am I the only one who hates the blade texture?  It makes the sword look like a carved stick!!! (at least in my humble opinion...)

Thus, I re-textured the blades of the ebony sword and ebony dagger with a Damascus steel pattern, then modified the color, saturation and brightness of the handles to contrast the new blade texture.  I think it looks nice...

Installation: just unzip the file in your skyrim data folder (Program Files (x86)/Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim/Data) and you\'re ready to go!!!
author: Ludimmean
